fb_code.title: Facebook locale code (eg: en_US, es_ES, etc)

loginBtn.title: 'Login' button text used in many places

logoutBtn.title: 'Logout' button text used in many places

closeBtn.title: 'Close' button text used in many places

signUpBtn.title: 'Sign up' button text used in many places

loggingYouIn.title: 'Logging you in...' message shown while logging in

fbPermissionError.title: 'Facebook login error!' message shown while permission error occurs while logging in
fbPermissionError.default: Facebook login error! You must allow the permissions to log in Facebook

noQuizzesYet.title: 'No quizzes yet!' message shown if there are no quizzes to show

hereAreSomeQuizzes.title: 'Here are some awesome quizzes' heading shown above quizzes list

loadingQuiz.title: 'Loading quiz..' message shown before a quiz is loaded

youMayAlsoLike.title: 'You may also like' heading shown above related quizzes

correctAnswers.title: 'Correct answers' heading above correct answers displayed at the end of quiz

clickLikeToChooseThisOption.title: 'Click like to choose this option' prompt in FB like type choice
clickLikeToChooseThisOption.default: Click like to choose this option

itsTheCorrectAnswer.title: 'It's the correct answer' for response on answering a question

theCorrectAnswerIs.title: 'The correct answer is' for response on answering a question

okNext.title: 'Okay! Next' for 'next' button on answering a question

preparingResult.title: 'Preparing the result' message shown after finishing quiz

hereIsTheResultIGot.title: 'Here is the result I got' message shown when a user lands on a quiz from a result shared by another user
hereIsTheResultIGot.default: Here is the result I got

nowTryYourselfAndLetMeKnowResult.title: 'Now try it yourself and let me know your result!' message shown when a user lands on a quiz from a result shared by another user
nowTryYourselfAndLetMeKnowResult.default: Now try it yourself and let me know your result!

seeCorrectAnswers.title: 'See correct answers' button text shown after finishing quiz

heyShareItPrompt.title: 'Hey! Share your result with your friends!' message shown after finishing quiz
heyShareItPrompt.default: Hey! Share your result with your friends!

iGot.title: 'I got' used in sharing the user's result on social media
iGot.description: For example: 'I got 100% Cute - How Cute are you?

tryThisQuizAgain.title: 'Wanna try this quiz again?' link shown to retake the quiz after it is finished

wannaTryMoreQuizzes.title: 'Wanna try more awesome quizzes?' Message shown to prompt the user to like your facebook page
wannaTryMoreQuizzes.description: For example: 'Wanna try more awesome quizzes? Like us on Facebook!

viewMoreQuizzes.title: 'View more quizzes' link shown below related quizzes in 'view quiz' page

fbNoEmailError.title: 'Facebook email ID cannot be obtained - error!'
fbNoEmailError.default: Facebook login error! Your email cannot be obtained. Either you have disallowed email permission or you don't have a verified email ID on your Facebook account.
fbNoEmailError.description: Message shown when the user's email ID cannot be obtained from Facebook due to disallowed permission or if the user hasn't verified his email on his Facebook account

copyCodeBelowToEmbedQuiz.title: 'Copy the code below to embed this Quiz'
copyCodeBelowToEmbedQuiz.default: Copy the code below to embed this Quiz

expandLeaderboard.title: 'More' - The text in the 'Expand leaderboard' button

contractLeaderboard.title: 'Less' - The text in the 'Contract leaderboard' button

viewAllLeaderboard.title: 'View all' - The link in the leaderboard widget to view the complete leaderboard

earnedNewPointsMessage.title: 'You have earned new points!' - The message shown in the popup when a user earns new points

earnedNewPointsOkayBtnText.title: 'Wow! Thats cool!' - The 'OK' button text in the popup shown when a user earns new points

noMoreItemsToLoad.title: 'No more items to load!' - The message to be shown when infinite scroll ends.

shareLockerMessage.title: 'Share this quiz to view your result!' - The message to be shown while forcing the user(if enabled) to share the quiz to view results.
shareLockerMessage.default: Share this quiz to view your result!
